verses.verse: Save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O God; for the waters <S%H4325><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> in unto my soul <S%H5315><s%>.

I sink <S%H2883><s%> in deep <S%H4688><s%> mire <S%H3121><s%>, where there is no standing <S%H4613><s%>: I am come <S%H935><s%> into deep <S%H4615><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, where the floods <S%H7641><s%> overflow me <S%H7857><s%>.
I am weary <S%H3021><s%> of my crying <S%H7121><s%>: my throat <S%H1627><s%> is dried <S%H2787><s%>: my eyes <S%H5869><s%> fail <S%H3615><s%> while I wait <S%H3176><s%> for my God <S%H430><s%>.

They that hate <S%H8130><s%> me without a cause <S%H2600><s%> are more <S%H7231><s%> than the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>: they that would destroy <S%H6789><s%> me <S%H341><s%>, being my enemies wrongfully <S%H8267><s%>, are mighty <S%H6105><s%>: then I restored <S%H7725><s%> that which I took not away <S%H1497><s%>.
O God <S%H430><s%>, you know <S%H3045><s%> my foolishness <S%H200><s%>; and my sins <S%H819><s%> are not hid from you <S%H3582><s%>.

Let not them that wait <S%H6960><s%> on you <S%H136><s%>, O Lord God <S%H3069><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, be ashamed <S%H954><s%> for my sake <S%H1245><s%>: let not those that seek you be confounded <S%H3637><s%> for my sake <S%H430><s%>, O God of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
Because for your sake I have borne <S%H5375><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%>; shame <S%H3639><s%> has covered <S%H3680><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%>.
I am become a stranger <S%H2114><s%> unto my brothers <S%H251><s%>, and an alien <S%H5237><s%> unto my mother <S%H517><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>.
For the zeal <S%H7068><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%> has eaten me up <S%H398><s%>; and the reproaches <S%H2781><s%> of them that reproached <S%H2778><s%> you are fallen upon me <S%H5307><s%>.
When I wept <S%H1058><s%>, and chastened my soul <S%H5315><s%> with fasting <S%H6685><s%>, that was to my reproach <S%H2781><s%>.
I made <S%H5414><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> also my garment <S%H3830><s%>; and I became a proverb to them <S%H4912><s%>.
They that sit in <S%H3427><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> speak <S%H7878><s%> against me <S%H5058><s%>; and I was the song of the drunkards <S%H8354><s%>.

But as for me <S%H8605><s%>, my prayer is unto you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, in a acceptable <S%H7522><s%> time <S%H6256><s%>: O God <S%H430><s%>, in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your mercy <S%H2617><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H571><s%>, in the truth of your salvation <S%H3468><s%>.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me out of the mire <S%H2916><s%>, and let me not sink <S%H2883><s%>: let me be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me <S%H4615><s%>, and out of the deep waters <S%H4325><s%>.

Let not the waterflood <S%H4325><s%> overflow <S%H7857><s%> me <S%H4688><s%>, neither let the deep swallow me up <S%H1104><s%>, and let not the pit <S%H875><s%> shut <S%H332><s%> her mouth upon me <S%H6310><s%>.

Hear <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord; for your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>: turn <S%H6437><s%> unto me according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%>.
And hide <S%H5641><s%> not your face <S%H6440><s%> from your servant <S%H5650><s%>; for I am in trouble <S%H6887><s%>: hear <S%H6030><s%> me speedily <S%H4118><s%>.
Draw near <S%H7126><s%> unto my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and redeem <S%H1350><s%> it <S%H6299><s%>: deliver me because of my enemies <S%H341><s%>.
You have known <S%H3045><s%> my reproach <S%H2781><s%>, and my shame <S%H1322><s%>, and my dishonor <S%H3639><s%>: my adversaries are all before you <S%H6887><s%>.

Reproach <S%H2781><s%> has broken <S%H7665><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>; and I am full of heaviness <S%H5136><s%>: and I looked <S%H6960><s%> for some to take pity <S%H5110><s%>, but there was none <S%H5162><s%>; and for comforters, but I found none <S%H4672><s%>.
They gave <S%H5414><s%> me also gall <S%H7219><s%> for my food <S%H1267><s%>; and in my thirst <S%H6772><s%> they gave me vinegar <S%H2558><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%>.
Let their table <S%H7979><s%> become a snare <S%H6341><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H7965><s%>: and that which should have been for their welfare, let it become a trap <S%H4170><s%>.
Let their eyes <S%H5869><s%> be darkened <S%H2821><s%>, that they see <S%H7200><s%> not <S%H4975><s%>; and make their body continually <S%H8548><s%> to shake <S%H4571><s%>.
Pour out <S%H8210><s%> your indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon them <S%H2740><s%>, and let your wrathful anger <S%H639><s%> take hold of them <S%H5381><s%>.
Let their habitation <S%H2918><s%> be desolate <S%H8074><s%>; and let none live <S%H3427><s%> in their tents <S%H168><s%>.
For they persecute <S%H7291><s%> him whom you have struck <S%H5221><s%>; and they talk <S%H5608><s%> to the grief <S%H4341><s%> of those whom you have wounded <S%H2491><s%>.
Add <S%H5414><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> unto their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: and let them not come <S%H935><s%> into your righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
Let them be blotted <S%H4229><s%> out of the book <S%H5612><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>, and not be written <S%H3789><s%> with the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and sorrowful <S%H3510><s%>: let your salvation <S%H3444><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, set me up on high <S%H7682><s%>.
I will praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> with a song <S%H7892><s%>, and will magnify <S%H1431><s%> him with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>.
This also shall please <S%H3190><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> better <S%H3190><s%> than a ox <S%H7794><s%> or bullock <S%H6499><s%> that has horns <S%H7160><s%> and hoofs <S%H6536><s%>.
The humble <S%H6035><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H8055><s%>, and be glad: and your heart <S%H3824><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> that seek <S%H1875><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> the poor <S%H34><s%>, and despises <S%H959><s%> not his prisoners <S%H615><s%>.
Let the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> him <S%H3220><s%>, the seas, and every thing that moves in it <S%H7430><s%>.

For God <S%H430><s%> will save <S%H3467><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and will build <S%H1129><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: that they may live <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H3423><s%>, and have it in possession.
The seed <S%H2233><s%> also of his servants <S%H5650><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it <S%H157><s%>: and they that love his name <S%H8034><s%> shall live in it <S%H7931><s%>.
